resources.string: %1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Always show Quick Settings on status bar pulldown
Vibrate when QS tiles are pressed
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Change the enter/exit animation of the power menu
Long press volume buttons to switch tracks while screen off
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Change the default font of the lockscreen date widget
Hide Left-Right Shortcuts on secure lock screens
Are you sure you want to reset these colors to default?
Change the default font of the lockscreen owner info
Use accent color for qs tile icons and background
Display negociated charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Double tap on statusbar to put the device to sleep
Double tap on the top third or bottom shortcut area of the lock screen to put the device to sleep
Show the network traffic indicator arrows
Always display battery percentage when charging
Custom charging symbol for text style
Custom charging symbol near battery percentage text
Display 4G icon in signal icon instead LTE
Display a cross sign next to signal bar when data is disabled
This will only disable the power menu on secure lock screens
Enable notification panel header weather display
Note\u003a you can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"Chronus icons\"
Condition icon pack is used in quick settings and lock screen
Show current weather condition and temperature
Weather is shown below date line with location
Weather is shown on the date line without location
Show name of current city on left of image
Show current city temperature on right of image
Change the default font of the lockscreen weather temp
Change the default font of the lockscreen weather city
Drag selection on the area you want to take as a screenshot
Customize screenshot attributes like time, delay,type etc
Show media cover art as the lockscreen background
Hide the lock icon on lockscreen
Display text at bottom of QS panel
Set to empty for default Ten-X
Display a warning at bottom of QS panel when network is monitored by external apps or vpn
Show toggle for adaptive brightness near the slider
Show buttons beside the brightness slider to adjust brightness
Light up the side edges of the screen on notification pulse
Show lights for all doze events and not just notifications
Show lights on Always On Display
Hide AOD content when lights are showing
Show TenX logo in the status bar
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Automatically turn on for these apps
Gaming mode will turn on automatically when these apps are opened and turn off when they are closed
Block all headsup notifications except calls & alarms
Block all headsup notifications except alarms
Block all headsup notifications except calls
Disable hardware buttons when Gaming mode is turned on
Lock screen brightness when Gaming mode is turned on
Try detecting and adding gaming apps automatically
Disable heads up in these applications
Disable heads up for these applications
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Enable with battery saver to increase power savings
Actions executed when the screen is turned off
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
Network mode will be switched to 3G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Show mobile type icon on top of the signal indicator
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery
Significant motion, accelerometer, linear acceleration sensors will be blocked for these apps
Wake up the device if charger is plugged/unplugged
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic equalizer for navigation bar and lockscreen
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Audio graphic equalizer on the lockscreen
Audio graphic equalizer on the ambient screen
Each bar is animated more smoothly
Display the number of pending notifications
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress menu
Play sound and vibrate for notifications when screen is on
Display Settings icon in quick settings footer
Display Running Services icon in quick settings footer
Display Multi-user switcher icon in quick settings footer
Display the tile edit icon in quick settings footer
Show quick settings on secure lockscreen
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Display roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Pause media when volume is muted and resume it by increasing volume within the timeout
Display a Lottie animation when the device is charging
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Use gradient color as a scale for the battery level
Clear All Button instead of Text
Show clear all notifications button in quick settings instead of default text one
Short click Volume Down and Power to take partial screenshot
Shows activity arrows near Wi-Fi icon
Shows activity arrows near Data symbol
